familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $5,001 - $15,000 in Capital Gains income from KF- Faire Fund II, LLC (Financial investments in The Faire Fund II, LP; Israel) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- Faire Fund II, LLC (Financial Investments In The Faire Fund II, LP; Israel)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $5,001 - $15,000 in Capital Gains income from KF- Faire Fund II, LLC (Financial investments in The Faire Fund II, LP; Israel) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested. Income amount is estimated.
familyMemberEthics.business: KF- Faire Fund II, LLC (Financial Investments In The Faire Fund II, LP; Israel)

familyMemberEthics.description: Another asset of Jared Kushner's, KF Faire Fund II, LLC, is reportedly invested in The Faire Fund II, LP. However, The Faire Fund II, LP is not included in his 2017 financial disclosure. Although the investment vehicle reportedly has been divested, this record is categorized as an unclear conflict of interest due to the lack of information about it.
familyMemberEthics.business: The Faire Fund II, LP; Israel
